page.title: 01BRORA IS ...
page.content: BRORA IS A SMALL VILLAGE ON THE NORTH- EAST COAST OF SCOTLAND. IT HAS A MILL, A DISTILLERY, SHOPS, A HARBOUR AND AN OLD FOLKS HOME. INVERNESS IS ABOUT 85 MILES AWAY, AND GLASGOW IS ABOUT 200 MILES AWAY. THERE ARE 11 BOATS IN THE HARBOUR. FISHING IS A VERY WELL RESPECTED HOBBIE.BRORA CONSISTS OF ABOUT TWENTY SHOPS. THE A9 ROAD RUNS THROUGH BRORA. THE TRANSPORT IN BRORA IS REASONABLY GOOD.THERE ARE BUSES , TRAINS AND TWO TAXI SERVICES AS WELL. THE POPULATION IN BRORA IS ROUND ABOUT TWO THOUSAND SO YOU NEED THIS AMOUNT OF TRANSPORT. THE FOLLOWING PAGES CONSISTS OF: EDUCATION IN BRORA, POLICE IN BRORA,EMPLOYMENT IN BRORA,CLUBS,A CHILD'S DAY.
